message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Your split seems a bit too much in your favor, especially considering the inflation. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a starting point for negotiation.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your offer doesn't reflect the rate at which your share is devaluing. I'm proposing 58/42, it's a compromise considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We're both losing money with each round. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it.
